entry.title: Scraping Together a Triathlon Training Plan

link.title: Scraping Together a Triathlon Training Plan

entry.summary: I signed up to compete in a half-Ironman(tm) triathlon on September 8, 2024. Completing a half-Ironman(tm) involves: 1.2 mile swim 56 mile bike 13.1 mile run It’s nice to have a solid training plan to prepare for such a demanding event, and many kind folks have compiled and published these online for public reference. Rather than constantly referring to a cluttered website, though, I w...

entry.title: Progressive Income Tax Visualiser
entry.summary: In this post, I exhibit the progressive income tax visualisation tool I’ve published as a Shiny App. Just Show the Thing Without ado, here it is: Waxing Poetic I still remember the aha-moment when I finally took the time to understand progressive tax schemes. entry.title: Reflections on ML
entry.summary: Latent thoughts and specific review regarding an introductory machine learning course taken at the University of Auckland. entry.title: Support Vector Machines
entry.summary: In this assignment for a machine learning course, I generate synthetic data and explore how the underlying patterns affect SVM tuning parameters. entry.title: NZ Housing Policy Exploration
entry.summary: In this post, I illustrate an end-to-end data science project investigating the impact of the February 2021 Residential Tenancies Amendment Bill by observing changing rental trends on the New Zealand housing market. Data Source The data is sourced from the NZ Tenancy Services website. Three CSV files are provided with territorial, regional, and quarterly aggregate bond statistics. In order to...
